name: Union Street Brawl
description:
Brawl your way through the Union Street pub crawl to gather your mates, and get ready for an eventful evening.

Created for University of Plymouth Game Jam - GAD Course. Jam entry for me was to brush up on some rusty Unity C#.

Links to Student entries will be linked below:

https://fontaiiiiine.itch.io/calcium-cannon - WINNER

https://danharrisstudent.itch.io/catacombs

Controls:

WASD / Arrows = Movement

Mouse = Aim

Hold RMB = Fight Stance / Guard

LMB = Punch

Dance Stage - Left / Right Arrows or A /D

(You can access the dance stage by clicking around the top right of the main menu.)

Sound is horribly balanced. Art clutter not finished.
